about_the_game:
Another One is a photorealistic co-op horror with procedurally generated liminal mazes.

"Black holes have turned the galaxy into chaos, and humanity has found a way out by drawing resources from alternative spaces. "Forwarders" were the so-called detachments that were engaged in extracting valuable items from simulations, the conditions of which were unrealistically extreme."

Will you and your team be able to survive in an environment where the world around you is falling apart?

  • Immerse yourself in a unique simulation where each entry into the game is a new, exciting story. Procedural generation creates liminal complexes, ensuring that no session will be like the previous one.

  • The simulation is becoming more unstable by the moment. Electromagnetic storm burns out electronics, and the indigenous inhabitants of the simulations are becoming more aggressive. Your task is to have time to evacuate yourself and valuable resources before the simulation collapses. Experience the adrenaline and tension, where every decision you make may be your last!

  • Every dive is a new challenge! Random item generation, entity behavior, and in-game events create a dynamic gaming environment where every choice matters. Prepare for unexpected scenario twists and unusual situations that will force you to adapt on the fly.

  • Enjoy stunning graphics where powerful shadows and bright contrasts create an atmosphere of complete immersion. The interior of the complex makes you believe in its reality, and the stylistic post-process makes the game visually fascinating. Feel the real horror when every shadow suddenly comes to life!

  • Immerse yourself in the world of sound design, which will take you to the heart of what is happening. Deep sounds and powerful effects create an atmosphere that can cause goosebumps. Every rustle, every scream and rumble is a part of your adventure, the emotions of which you will not be able to forget!

Screenshots and descriptions will be updated. Add Another one to your wishlist now to stay up to date with the latest news and updates!

name: Another One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Additional Notes: TBD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11

short_description: Another One is a photorealistic co-op horror with procedurally generated liminal complexes. Get into them by immersing yourself in simulations with random conditions. Explore the complex, find valuable items, evacuate before the simulation closes. What could possibly go wrong?
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
